translation.welcome: Welcome to React, tailwindcss and more

home.heroDesc: A modern, blazing-fast React + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS + Tauri starter with i18n, TurboRepo, and more. Build beautiful web and cross-platform desktop apps, faster.
home.modalDemoMessage: Are you ready to get started?

react.title: React 19 + TypeScript
react.desc: Modern React with full TypeScript support.

tailwind.title: Tailwind CSS
tailwind.desc: Utility-first CSS for rapid UI development.

vite.title: Vite
vite.desc: Next-generation frontend tooling for fast builds.

eslint.title: ESLint
eslint.desc: Code linting for consistent code quality.

prettier.title: Prettier
prettier.desc: Automated code formatting for style consistency.

husky.title: Husky & lint-staged
husky.desc: Pre-commit hooks for linting and formatting your code.

axios.title: Axios
axios.desc: Promise-based HTTP client for the browser.

swr.title: SWR
swr.desc: React Hooks library for data fetching with caching and revalidation.

nuqs.title: nuqs
nuqs.desc: Type-safe URL state management with React hooks.

tauri.title: Tauri
tauri.desc: Cross-platform desktop applications with Rust backend and web frontend.
